column4: hi all... i need a program to help my friend remotely, however, he is using windows, and im using linux, so i need an easy vnc server for him to install
as i have no way of testing a windows server
VNC comes with ubuntu, i beleive
Who is server, you or him?
Select it, then from the package menu, select "hold"
i have a lock version and a force version
and that will remain forever right?
Well, it won't prompt you to update it anymore.
